text.title: Three people die in New South Wales storms
text.head: Three people die in New South Wales storms
Sources

list.item: Neil Keene, Samantha Townsend. "Stormageddon: Dungog awash with pain and devastation" — The Daily Telegraph (Australia) , April 22, 2015
AAP. "Wild weather lashes NSW, leaving 100,000 homes without power" — The Australian , April 21, 2015
Bridie Jabour. "Three die as 'once-in-a-decade' storms lash Sydney and surrounding regions" — The Guardian , April 21, 2015
